mean_cn: adj. 神秘的，神秘主义的；  n. 神秘主义者
mean_en: a person who tries to gain religious or spiritual knowledge through prayer and deep thought :someone who practices mysticism
word_etyma: myst 神话+ ic名词/形容词后缀 ...的 → mystic神秘的
sentence: Are our boyfriends cheating on us? Let's ask this mystic crystal ball!
sentence_trans: 我们的男票们有劈腿吗？让我们来问问神秘的水晶球！
